schema:creator: Guenther, Holly
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ I have a small business selling my artwork so I know how hard it can be to run a small business. When the closures happened I wanted to support Davis small businesses as much as possible. Apparently all I've been doing during SIP is eating and reading when not working remotely! Chinese take out from Ding How fresh bread from Upper Crust Bakery  
 __Participant age:__ 43  
 __Category:__  Adult Age 15+: Graphic Art
schema:name: Shoppin' Small
